Text Size DALLAS-- NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell is not concerned about Michael Vick being billed as hosting a Super Bowl party because the Eagles quarterback told him it's not true. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said. For better or worse, fans like it when you get superstars going against each other. People have been hearing about these guys for years now, but they haven't gotten this far before where they met each other at this level. That gets people interested.
